idontneedstone.name: IDontNeedStone
If true, you will not pick up items in the blacklist.
Also the main switch of this mod. If set to false, this mod will do nothing about your game.
idontneedstone.config.option.isfilterdis:
If true, the filtered item will disappeared in a short time.
Work when 'Filter items in blacklist' is on.
idontneedstone.config.option.blacklist.t:
Items you don't want to pick up.
Use item's full name like "minecraft:cobblestone"
Try to click the `+` and/or `-` button on the left side.
idontneedstone.config.option.disappeared:
If 'Filtered items disappeared quickly' is true, how many ticks it takes to disappeared.
20 ticks = 1 sec
If is 0, items will disappeared immediately
idontneedstone.config.option.autodrop.to: If your Inventory is full, and you are going to pick up something. You will automatically drop items which in blacklist so that you can pick up the items on the ground.
idontneedstone.config.option.autodropkee: If 'Auto-drop' is true, you will keep at least X stacks items on the blacklist in your Inventory.
